devdoc.details: NFT minting contract with gated access based on off-chain signature verification. This contract extends ERC721 for NFT functionality, TxAuthDataVerifier for signature verification, and Ownable for ownership management. It uses a counter to assign unique token IDs to minted NFTs.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

NexeraIDSignatureVerified(uint256,uint25.details: Event emitted when a signature is verified

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

params.signerAddress: The address allowed to sign transaction data for minting authorization.

getLastTokenId().details: Returns the last token ID that was minted.

returns._0: The current value of the token ID counter, which corresponds to the last minted token ID.

params._txAuthData: The transaction authentication data to hash

returns._0: The keccak256 hash of the encoded `TxAuthData`
The current nonce of the user

mintNFTGated(address,uint256,bytes).details: Leverages the `requireTxDataAuth` modifier for efficient signature verification.

params._blockExpiration: The block number after which the request is considered expired.
params.recipient: The address to which the NFT will be minted.

returns._0: The ID of the newly minted NFT upon successful verification and minting.

mintNFTGatedWithAddress(address,address,.details: Leverages the `requireTxDataAuth` modifier for efficient signature verification.

params._blockExpiration: The block number after which the request is considered expired.
params.recipient: The address to which the NFT will be minted.
params.userAddress: The address requesting the signature (in case a contract wants to call this)

returns._0: The ID of the newly minted NFT upon successful verification and minting.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setSigner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner

params._signer: The address of the new signer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Example Gated NFT Minter

BlockExpired().notice: Custom error for handling signature expiry

InvalidSignature().notice: Custom error for handling invalid signatures

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract by setting a name, symbol, and signer for TxAuthDataVerifier.

getLastTokenId().notice: Retrieves the current value of the token ID counter.

getMessageHash((uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Generates a hash of the given `TxAuthData`

getUserNonce(address).notice: Retrieves the current nonce for a given user

mintNFTGated(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Mints a new NFT to a specified recipient, using an optimized signature verification process.

mintNFTGatedWithAddress(address,address,.notice: Mints a new NFT to a specified recipient, using an optimized signature verification process.

nonces(address).notice: Mapping to track the nonces of users to prevent replay attacks
